text: Gopinath Pandurang Munde (12 December 1949 â€“ 3 June 2014) was an Indian politician. He served as Minister of Rural Development from 26 May 2014 until his death on 3 June 2014. He was appointed by Prime Minister of India Narendra Modi. Before serving as minister, he served as Member of Lok Sabha from 2009 until his death in 2014. Munde died in a car crash in New Delhi, aged 64. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Politicians from Maharashtra Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Gopinath Munde
